data.value: The where method is an application of the if-then idiom. For each element in the calling DataFrame, if
the element is used; otherwise the corresponding element from the DataFrame
For further details and examples see the
is True, keep the original value. Where False, replace with corresponding value from
is callable, it is computed on the Series/DataFrame and should return boolean Series/DataFrame or array. The callable must not change input Series/DataFrame (though pandas doesn't check it).

. If other is callable, it is computed on the Series/DataFrame and should return scalar or Series/DataFrame. The callable must not change input Series/DataFrame (though pandas doesn't check it).
Whether to perform the operation in place on the data.
Note that currently this parameter won't affect the results and will always coerce to a suitable dtype.
Try to cast the result back to the input type (if possible).

children.type_: Same type as caller or None if ``inplace=True``.

data.value: Replace values where the condition is False.
